channel.title: manova on I'm a Chordata! Urochordata!
channel.description: Recent content in manova on I'm a Chordata! Urochordata!

item.title: when NOT to MANOVA
item.description: And now its time for a multivariate stats geek out. The statistics that we use determine the inferences we draw from our data. The more statistical tools you learn to use, the more likely you are likely to slip on a loose bit of data, and stab yourself in the eyeball with your swiss-army-knife of p values. It’s happened to all of us, and it is rarely due to willful misconduct.
